# NTUTrainRL2_1
This is the lecture notes for NTU Train Course of R Project Lecture 2_1

## R Basic Plotting System

### 資料載入

```{r}
setwd("C:/NTUTrainRL2")
Sys.setlocale(category = "LC_ALL", locale = "cht")
accidentList <- readRDS('data/accidentList.rds')
```

### bar plot



```{r}
par(mfrow=c(3,2))
barplot(table(accidentList$county), main="依縣市別", ylab="人數")
barplot(table(accidentList$hospital), main="依醫院別", ylab="人數", las=2)
barplot(table(accidentList$gender), main="依性別", ylab="人數")
barplot(table(accidentList$nationality), main="依國籍", ylab="人數")
barplot(table(accidentList$woundType1), main="依醫療檢傷", ylab="人數")
barplot(table(accidentList$woundType2), main="依救護檢傷", ylab="人數")

barPlots <- function(){
  titles <- c("依縣市別", "依性別", "依國籍", "依醫療檢傷", "依救護檢傷")
  variables <- colnames(accidentList[, c(-2, -5)])
  index <- 1
  for (index in length(variables)){
    barplot(table(accidentList$variables[index]), main=titles[index], ylab="人數")
  }
}
barPlots()

```
